title: Desperate but Happy Hotel Stay
text: I needed a room after leaving the Ramada, with a very mean, front desk reception. The reception at the Aida wasjust the opposite, he was super; his wife and daughter came to visit at times. I stayed in a shared bathroom unit.Low noise and an Asian restaurant 1 block away, also 1 around the corner.The hotel is a lot better than it looks.After visiting my prospective city, I returned to the Aida.
